attributes.action: Exempt Grassroots Football from the list of venues required to close for Covid
attributes.background:
Work with the FA to allow grassroots football to continue outside.
Coaches and players are doing a fantastic job to keep within guidance and the mental well-being of millions of people (mainly kids) is affected by not playing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
